document_data.name: Yago
document_data.mainbody: '''Yago''' was a [[wizard]] who lived in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] during the midâˆ’14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was an exceptionally vindictive and spiteful individual.
document_data.Possessions: Yago wore a ''[[knave's robe]]'' and kept a personal [[spellbook]] that was filled the specifications of various [[curse]]s.
document_data.History: Circa the {{yearlinkName|1368}}, Yago's wife Brielbara had an affair with the adventurer named [[Coran]]. The two had a [[half-elven]] child called [[Namara (half-elf)|Namara]]. Yago cursed the baby and holed himself away at the [[Low Lantern]] gambling den in the [[Baldur's Gate/Eastway|Eastway]] district of Baldur's Gate.
